ClassDef.Name: Light

Properties.Name: Color
Properties.Description: Sets the color of the light.

Properties.Name: Brightness
Properties.Description: Sets the brightness of the light.

Properties.Name: Specular
Properties.Description: Sets the specular intensity of the light.

Properties.Name: Shadows
Properties.Description: Enables or disables shadows cast by the light.

ClassDef.Description: Light is an abstract base class for all light objects in the world.
